verses.text: TOKONI mai, ‘Eiki, he kuo ‘autalua ‘a e faka‘otua: Kuo mei ‘osi mei he hako‘i tangata ‘a e fa‘ahinga tōnunga.
Ko e kākā ‘oku nau lea‘aki, ‘a e tangata mo hono kaungā‘api: Ko e loungutu momole‘olunga mo e loto-lōua ‘oku nau fai‘aki.
Ke faka‘auha mai ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘a e ngaahi loungutu momole‘olunga, ‘A e ‘elelo ‘oku lea fakamofutofuta:
‘A ia ko ‘enau lea ‘oku fai, “Ko homau ‘elelo te mau mālohi ai; Te mau fa‘iteliha he fai‘aki homau loungutu: Ko hai ‘a e ‘eiki kiate kimautolu?”
“Koe‘uhi ko e tu‘utāmaki ‘o e fakamālohi, Koe‘uhi ko e to‘e ‘a si‘i masiva, Ko ia, te u toki tu‘u ai eni (ko Sihova ia ‘oku folofola mai); Te u ‘ai ia ki he tu‘umālie ‘oku ne holi ki ai.”
Ko e folofola ‘a Sihova ko e ngaahi lea ‘asinisini; Ko e siliva kuo fakama‘a‘i he fōnise ‘i he kelekele, kuo tu‘o fitu hono sivi.
Ko koe te ke fakalekesi kinautolu, ‘e Sihova, Te ke tauhi kinautolu mei he to‘utangata ni ‘o ta‘engata.
‘Oku takanoa ‘a e kakai hia ‘O ka hākeaki‘i ‘i he kakai ‘a e koto fakalielia.
